input_text:
Job Title: Controller

Location: Kapolei, HI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
We are recruiting a Controller for a large and successful distribution/manufacturing company located throughout Hawaii. This position is on-site in Oahu and reports to the Senior Director. This is a great opportunity to work for a well-established and highly regarded organization. Our client offers a family-oriented work culture and a generous compensation package. The Controller will establish and implement financial policies, controls, perform financial risk assessments, and prepare annual budgets and forecasts. Salary: $175,000-$185,000 with $20k-$35k bonus potential stock plan.
The ideal candidate will have at least five years of strong finance leadership experience implementing internal controls and process improvement. CPA license required. 
PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:Oversee the financial reporting of all business units and its issuance to the corporate office.Manage and direct the preparation of financial statements.Ensure financial information is reviewed and approved in accordance with established policies.Evaluate and enhance financial controls and tax return procedures.Analyze and interpret balance sheets, income statements, cash flow, and liabilities.Coordinate and assist with the preparation of the budget and financial forecasts and report variances.Prepare and review journal entries and account reconciliations.Monitor closing processes, billing, invoicing, and expenses.Management of both credit and bond accounts.Manage escalated customer service issues and complaints, while ensuring adherence to quality service guidelines.Oversee the company's ERP processing systems to ensure transactions are posted accurately.Monitor cash balances and cash forecasts.Oversee financial and accounting staff to include Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable.Analyze profit center performance metrics.Maintain fixed asset records.Assess current accounting operations, offering recommendations for improvement, and implement new processes.Ensure all corporate regulated controls are adhered to, standard documents are updated, and accessible and approval requirements are met. Ensure that the company complies with all legal and regulatory requirements.
SKILLS & QUALIFICATIONS:Minimum 5 years of progressively responsible experience for a mid-size or larger Corporation.Certified Public Accountant designation.Bachelor's degree in accounting or finance.Advanced competency in financial management and accounting software.DMSi Agility & Falcon are desired.High level of written and oral communication skills. In-depth knowledge of accounting standards and industry regulations.Superb organizational and time management abilities.Excellent leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.Excellent Microsoft Excel skills.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Manage and direct the preparation of financial statements.
Ensure financial information is reviewed and approved in accordance with established policies.
Evaluate and enhance financial controls and tax return procedures.
Analyze and interpret balance sheets, income statements, cash flow, and liabilities.
Coordinate and assist with the preparation of the budget and financial forecasts and report variances.
Prepare and review journal entries and account reconciliations.
Monitor closing processes, billing, invoicing, and expenses.
Management of both credit and bond accounts.
Manage escalated customer service issues and complaints, while ensuring adherence to quality service guidelines.
Oversee the company's ERP processing systems to ensure transactions are posted accurately.
Monitor cash balances and cash forecasts.
Oversee financial and accounting staff to include Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable.
Assess current accounting operations, offering recommendations for improvement, and implement new processes.
Ensure all corporate regulated controls are adhered to, standard documents are updated, and accessible and approval requirements are met.
